Before the Flop

poker strategy

This app helps you determine what move you should make in poker based on your position, opposition and cards

  • Step 1: Type e,m,l,b or s representing your position Early, Middle, Late, Big Blind or Small Blind.
  • Step 2: Type a,k,q,j,t,9,8,7,6,5,4,3,2 representing your 1st dealt card
  • Step 3: Type a,k,q,j,t,9,8,7,6,5,4,3,2 representing your 2nd dealt card
  • Searching for 'eaa' give you play instructions for aces in early position hide
display instructions

In {{item.positionDisplay}} position with {{item.card1}}{{item.card2}} {{item.suited}} you should {{item.unraisedPot}}

When the pot is raised you should {{item.raisedPot}}
